alert.note: Alert for Bennett; Eastern Fall River; Northern Oglala Lakota; Southern Foothills; Southern Oglala Lakota; Western Fall River (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 23 at 1:15AM MST until January 23 at 8:00AM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Portions of southwestern South Dakota and northeast Wyoming. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Pine Ridge Reservation. * WHEN...Until 8 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Motorists may encounter areas of frosty and slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your low-beam headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Bennett; Eastern Fall River; Northern Oglala Lakota; Southern Foothills; Southern Oglala Lakota; Western Fall River
